channel.title: Salil Chandra RSS
channel.description: This is my RSS feed composed of news articles I find interesting.

item.title: Google is permanently nerfing all Home Minis because mine spied on everything I said 24/7 [Update x2]
item.description: Recently, privacy concerns have been expressed over Google Home products.

item.title: Roger Federer beats Rafael Nadal for fifth straight time, wins Shanghai Masters title
item.description: Meeting for the fourth time this year, Federer once again defeats Nadal to win the Masters 1000 title in Shanghai.

item.title: Hurricane Ophelia heading to Ireland, then Scotland
item.description: Hurricane Ophelia is a Category 2 storm that is heading east towards Ireland. It is travelling farther east than any other major hurricane.

item.title: Hogwarts Express rescues stranded family in Scotland
item.description: The Jacobite steam train, the one featured in the Harry Potter movies, rescued a family of six this past Friday in Scotland.
